1122214180239470592.text:
I couldn't agree more. 

Meetings <15 mins are transactional exchanges of info. 
Conversations >1h build long term value in relationships. 

Both are useful at times, but I prefer to foster the latter. Particularly in crypto, where few are here for the long run. I am!https://twitter.com/david_perell/status/1117583531276849152 …

1096956569462468609.text:
"I am for betting because I am against bullshit. Bullshit is polluting our discourse and drowning the facts. 

A bet costs the bullshitter more than the non-bullshitter so the willingness to bet signals honest belief. 

A bet is a tax on bullshit."

- @ATabarrok
